text: Kare wa, anata gata ni mieru hashira mo nashi ni sho ten o tsukuri, mata chijō ni wa shikkari to yamayama o suete anata gata to tomoni guratsukanai yō ni nasa reru. Shushuzattana dōbutsu o sore ni maki chirasa reru. Mata ware wa, ten kara ame o furase, iroirona migotona mono o soko ni shiyū de seiiku sa seta
